value.title: 3 ways to try Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you wanting to try Power BI, but not sure where to start? I look at some ways you can get up and running with Power BI quickly. value.title: A better way to share Personal Bookmarks in Power BI
value.excerpt: A while back Adam shared how you can share a personal bookmark with others. There is now a better way to share personal bookmarks in Power BI if your report is in a workspace. value.title: Allow users to Show and Hide columns in a Power BI Paginated report!

value.title: Are you thinking about your tooltips in Power BI?

Create tooltips based on report pages https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/desktop-tooltips?tabs=powerbi-desktop
